column3: This reminds me how meditative it can be to rip on a bike for me with having Cerebral Palsy!!!
I'd be terrified of being impaled by my own pen if I came off. Voice memo on phone might be more comforting

Have you ever used voice memos on your phone? It's a great feature that helps me store my video ideas while I'm out riding. I have to carry it anyway and it fits in my cargo pockets, jersey or fanny pack.
Whatever did she do before she had pockets in her shorts!?!
I think it is so funny how legendary Rapha's ads are, haha! Fine filmmaking and it does make me want ride, even I can only afford cutoff jeans and a Huffy! Cheers, Steve aka The Talking Fly
